scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../
scripts.buildDev: cd client && npm run buildDev && cd ../
scripts.buildWatch: cd client && npm run start-client && cd ../
scripts.dockerBuildWebLocal: npm run build && docker-compose up web && npm run buildDev
scripts.copyToServer: npm run build && scp -i "${PEM_FILE}" .env ${EC2_URL}:${EC2_APP_PATH}/.env && rsync --include .git --exclude-from="$(git -C . ls-files --exclude-standard -oi --directory >.git/ignores.tmp && echo .git/ignores.tmp)" -rave "ssh -i ${PEM_FILE}" . ec2-user@ec2-54-172-80-40.compute-1.amazonaws.com:/home/ec2-user/app && npm run buildDev
scripts.deployWeb: npm run loadENV && npm run copyToServer && ssh -i ${PEM_FILE} ${EC2_URL} 'cd ${EC2_APP_PATH} && docker-compose up web'
scripts.deployInit: npm run loadENV && npm run copyToServer && ssh -i ${PEM_FILE} ${EC2_URL} 'cd ${EC2_APP_PATH} && docker-compose up'
